name: Alphabet Game Jumpy
description:
This is a game made for 4+ children .

The aim of the game is to collect letters of the alphabet. This is a very simple platformer game that uses voice and image techniques to teach the alphabet. 

Game Controls:

Left = Left Key

Right = Right Key

Jump = Up Key

"R" = Returns you back to main menu.. Click "Continue" in order to load your previous spot. (if you die just hit "R" and follow the instructions on how to return to where you were. )

Enter key = confirming your choice

Get the game and play with your child! Spend hours having fun and feel comfortable knowing that it's teaching them too! 

This game was made entirely by Maxwell Wallace

PS. The letters ... kind of charge towards you! SO BE CAREFUL!
